task_prefix: Complete set of possible board configurations at the end of tic-tac-toe games. Encodes all legal endgame positions where player X moved first. Used for classification of winning positions. Each example contains 9 features. Predict the target class.

column_descriptions.top-left-square: State of the top-left square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 1,1).
column_descriptions.top-middle-square: State of the top-middle square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 1,2).
column_descriptions.top-right-square: State of the top-right square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 1,3).
column_descriptions.middle-left-square: State of the middle-left square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 2,1).
column_descriptions.middle-middle-square: State of the center square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 2,2).
column_descriptions.middle-right-square: State of the middle-right square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 2,3).
column_descriptions.bottom-left-square: State of the bottom-left square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 3,1).
column_descriptions.bottom-middle-square: State of the bottom-middle square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 3,2).
column_descriptions.bottom-right-square: State of the bottom-right square of the tic-tac-toe board (position 3,3).

class_description: Classes: 'positive' (X wins - player X has achieved three-in-a-row in any direction), 'negative' (X does not win - either O wins or game is a draw)
